snippet.title: The Legend of Zelda: Link’s Awakening Gameplay - Nintendo Treehouse: Live | E3 2019
snippet.description:
Witness one of the most beloved games in The Legend of Zelda series return in this modern re-imagining. In this live demonstration, you’ll see Mabe Village, the reveal of a notable dungeon, and a tour of the new Chamber Dungeons, which allows you to complete objectives by arranging dungeon rooms.

#Zelda #TheLegendofZelda #LinksAwakening #NintendoSwitch #E32019
